metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11224 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Libav 12.3. A read access violation in the in_table_init16 function in libavcodec/aacsbr.c allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash), as demonstrated by avconv.

notes.Note: ebarretto> No fix available as of 2019-03-01

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
